data.title: TECHRTON CABLES
data.text:
Company Background

Dailan Techtron Cables Co., Ltd. is a national grade technology enterprise that manufactures professional wires and cables. Founded in July, 2008, concentrates in research and development of high grade wires and cables.

From the Chinese Government, we got the awards of Dailan City Famous Brand, Liaoling Province Famous Brand, Technology R&D Organization of the Dailan Jinzhou New Development Zone.

In the country, we obtained more than 20 patents in manufacturing wires and cables. We also got the certificates of Professional Special New Technology, Products of High Grade New Technology.

For management, we got the certifications of ISO9001 QA, ISO14000 Environmental, OHSAS18001 Occupational Health, Japan PSE Products, China CCC Products, Japan F-Mark Products.

The products we make are digital home appliance cables, halogen√Ç free telecommunication wires, super soft data control cables, new energy super soft power cables, special type wires and cables. Our business partners are famous brands in local and overseas markets.

Our current total investment is RMB250 millions, production plant is 35,000m2. With our strong investment power, big professional technical team, we can manufacture good quality products and provide a good after sales service, let us cooperate to bring a bright future.
